comments.body:
I was gonna propose that we convert this into some `Observable[Source]` for the active open buffer but I don't think that will work since we don't receive a notification when the active/focused buffer changes. We only receive notifications didChange and documentSymbols. 

I think keeping this in `Buffers` is actually not as bad as it seems at first sight. Can we maybe hook into the `didClose` event to remove stale sources?

> I think keeping this in Buffers is actually not as bad as it seems at first sight.

Is the parsed `Source` per buffer useful anywhere else?

> Can we maybe hook into the didClose event to remove stale sources?

Good idea, I will add it.

> Is the parsed Source per buffer useful anywhere else?

Yes, in scalafix. We should share the pipeline between the two, putting it in Buffers is a good start.
Added hook for `didClose` event in d890af94d4d84e3e2267a08f8b92ce761fa4a7a7. Should it also remove from the `contents` map?
